TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDataSource

summary.span: 表示数据绑定控件绑定到的抽象数据源。

span.span: Represents an abstract data source that data-bound controls bind to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 支持控件数据绑定体系结构，使 Web 服务器控件能够以一致的方式绑定到数据。ASP.NET supports a control data-binding architecture that enables Web server controls to bind to data in a consistent fashion. 绑定到数据的 Web 服务器控件被称为数据绑定控件，而用于简化绑定的类称为数据源控件。Web server controls that bind to data are referred to as data-bound controls, and the classes that facilitate that binding are called data source controls. 数据源控件可以表示任意数据源：关系数据库、文件、流、业务对象等。Data source controls can represent any data source: a relational database, a file, a stream, a business object, and so on. 数据源控件以一致的方式向数据绑定控件提供数据，而与基础数据的源或格式无关。Data source controls present data in a consistent way to data-bound controls, regardless of the source or format of the underlying data. 如果要实现自己的自定义 ASP.NET 数据源控件，请实现接口。You implement the interface when you want to implement your own custom ASP.NET data source control. 实现接口的任何类 都是数据源控件。Any class that implements the interface is a data source control. 接口用作所有 ASP.NET 数据源控件的基础，并定义了其中一种基本的数据绑定体系结构概念及其两种方法： 方法和 方法。The interface serves as the foundation for all ASP.NET data source controls and defines one of the fundamental data-binding architecture concepts with its two methods: the method and the method. 此概念是所有数据源控件都支持其数据的一个或多个命名视图。This concept is that all data source controls support one or more named views on their data. 数据源视图对象类似于 命名空间中的抽象 ：一个数据可绑定的、自定义的数据视图，用于排序、筛选以及该视图定义的其他数据操作。The data source view object is similar to the abstraction in the namespace: a data-bindable, customized view of data for sorting, filtering, and other data operations that the view defines. 数据源控件的核心只是检索数据的视图。At its core, a data source control does nothing more than retrieve views on data. 数据源控件可以有一个或多个关联的数据源视图对象。A data source control can have one or more associated data source view objects. 某些数据源控件（包括表示关系数据库的数据源控件，如 和 ）仅支持一个视图。Some data source controls, including those that represent relational databases such as and , support only one view. 其他数据源控件（包括分层数据源控件，如 ）支持多个视图。Other data source controls, including hierarchical data source controls such as , support many views. 数据源视图定义数据源的功能以及它所支持的操作。The data source view defines the capabilities of a data source and the operations that it supports. 总而言之，数据源控件实现 接口，支持其所表示的数据的一个或多个命名视图，并始终支持从其所表示的数据源中检索数据。In summary, data source controls implement the interface, support one or more named views on the data they represent, and always support data retrieval from the data source they represent. 数据源控件始终按需检索数据，如 `DataBind` 在数据绑定控件上调用时。Data source controls always retrieve data on demand, such as when `DataBind` is called on a data bound control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示类如何实现接口定义的方法 ，以便向数据绑定控件提供数据。The following code example demonstrates how a class can implement the methods defined by the interface to provide data to data-bound controls. 在此示例中，数据源控件充当逗号分隔值文件中的数据源，并且可供任何数据绑定控件用来显示以逗号分隔的文件数据。The data source control in this example acts as a data source on a comma-separated value file, and can be used by any data-bound control to display comma-separated file data. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/CS/csvdatasource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/VB/csvdatasource.vb#1)]

summary.span: 数据源控件以某种影响数据绑定控件的方式发生变化时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a data source control has changed in some way that affects data-bound controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当数据绑定控件的属性或基础数据在某种程度上发生更改时，会引发该事件，此方法会影响数据绑定控件及其数据之间的数据绑定。The event is raised when the properties of a data-bound control or the underlying data has changed in some way that affects the data bindings between a data-bound control and its data. 例如，如果 在基于文件的数据源控件上更改了文件名属性（如属性），则会引发事件。For example, the event is raised if a file name property, such as the property, is changed on a file-based data source control. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.DataSourceView GetView(string viewName) cil managed
Public Function GetView (viewName As String) As DataSourceView

span.span: The name of the view to retrieve.

summary.span: 获取与数据源控件关联的指定数据源视图。

span.span: Gets the named data source view associated with the data source control.

returns.span: 返回与 关联的指定 。

span.span: Returns the named associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据源控件类可支持其基础数据的一个或多个视图。Data source control classes can support one or more views on their underlying data. 这些视图由类的实例表示 。These views are represented by instances of the class. 数据源视图定义数据源控件的功能，并执行从基础数据存储区中检索数据以及执行排序、插入、删除和更新等操作所需的所有工作。The data source view defines the capabilities of a data source control, and performs all the work necessary to retrieve data from the underlying data store and perform operations such as sorting, inserting, deleting, and updating. 实现接口的数据源控件类 实现 方法以返回与类关联的强类型视图对象。Data source control classes that implement the interface implement the method to return strongly typed view objects associated with the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示实现接口的数据源控件类如何 实现 方法，并返回类的强类型实例 。The following code example demonstrates how a data source control class that implements the interface implements the method, returning a strongly typed instance of the class. 由于数据源控件只支持一个视图，因此它将忽略名称并返回一个名为的视图，其默认视图名称为。Because the data source control supports only one view, it ignores the name and returns a view named with the default view name. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/CS/csvdatasource.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/VB/csvdatasource.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.ICollection GetViewNames() cil managed

summary.span: 获取名称的集合，表示与 接口关联的视图对象的列表。

span.span: Gets a collection of names representing the list of view objects associated with the interface.

returns.span: 包含视图名称的 ，这些视图与 关联。

span.span: An that contains the names of the views associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据源控件类可支持其基础数据的一个或多个命名视图。Data source control classes can support one or more named views on their underlying data. 方法返回当前与数据源控件实例关联的视图名称的集合。The method returns a collection of view names currently associated with the data source control instance. 调用方可以循环访问视图名称的集合，并 使用方法检索单个对象 。Callers can iterate through the collection of view names and retrieve individual objects with the method. 实现接口的数据源控件类 实现 方法以返回名称的集合，这些名称表示当前与数据源控件类相关联的所有数据源视图对象。Data source control classes that implement the interface implement the method to return a collection of names that represents all the data source view objects currently associated with the data source control class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示实现接口的数据源控件如何 实现 方法，并返回 名称的集合。The following code example demonstrates how a data source control that implements the interface implements the method, returning an collection of names. 由于数据源仅支持一个视图，因此该方法返回一个元素的集合，该集合使用视图的默认名称。Because the data source supports only one view, the method returns a collection of one element using the default name for the view. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/CS/csvdatasource.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/VB/csvdatasource.vb#4)]
